title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cut costs & operate efficiently on Amazon RDS for SQL Server & Oracle (DAT325)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 降低成本并高效运行 Amazon RDS for SQL Server 和 Oracle (DAT325)
abstract: Discover how leading enterprises are leveraging 15+ years of Amazon RDS operational excellence to power their SQL Server and Oracle databases in the cloud. In this session, explore features across Amazon RDS for SQL Server and Oracle that help you achieve substantial cost savings, enhanced scalability, and efficient operations. Through real-world cost optimization techniques and architectural best practices, learn how organizations are reducing operational overhead and costs while improving availability, scalability, and performance.
abstract_cn: 了解领先企业如何利用Amazon RDS超过15年的运营卓越经验，在云端为其SQL Server和Oracle数据库提供支持。在本次会议中，探索Amazon RDS for SQL Server和Oracle的各项功能，帮助您实现大幅成本节约、增强的可扩展性和高效运营。通过真实世界的成本优化技术和架构最佳实践，了解各组织如何在降低运营开销和成本的同时，提升可用性、可扩展性和性能。
